TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur needs someone to pick blooming flowers.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_TODO_00<tab>Collect crimson Karvarhur blooms on the northern banks of Karvarhur the First.
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the crimson Karvarhur blooms to the beleaguered brewer in Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>In the course of the brewery's work to produce kirkahryar, they happened to create a corn-based beverage the workers find quite rejuvenating.
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>Alongside kirkahryar, the brewery produces a corn-based beverage that is quite popular among the workers.

TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>In fact, they can scarce keep up with demand, and the stock of ingredients is entirely depleted. As an artisan yourself, I suspect you have an eye for high-quality produce—would you mind picking some crimson Karvarhur blooms?

TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_VUYARGUR_000_004<tab>We simmer them with the corn, and they grow on the northern shore of Karvarhur the First. Once you've collected a few blooms, please deliver them directly to the brewery.
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_SAKEYOK05360_000_010<tab>If you're here for the corn drink, I'm afraid you're out of luck! We've been drunk dry, and haven't the ingredients to make more...
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_SAKEYOK05360_000_011<tab>As I said, we're out of─ What? Crimson Karvarhur blooms!? Have you come to replenish our stores?
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_SAKEYOK05360_000_012<tab>Oh, thank you! Now I can get that thirsty lot off my back! Time to get to work!
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_SAKEYOK05360_000_013<tab>Now I can get that thirsty lot off my back─once this batch is ready!
TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_VUYARGUR_000_015<tab>I hear you delivered the flowers. Thank you, it is quite the trek to Karvarhur the First.

TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_VUYARGUR_000_016<tab>Simmering them with corn and spice results in a fragrant, deep red—almost purple—beverage. Some swear by its restorative effects, and the ingredients are certainly wholesome enough.

TEXT_BANYOK125_05360_VUYARGUR_000_017<tab>Given its popularity, I suspect we may find ourselves in a similar predicament again soon. I only hope supplies last long enough for me to get a drink myself!
